name: Kill The Pink Boss
description:
This's my first game with Unity C#

I get start to learn Unity to make my game and I make this game to prove my understanding. I tried to learn on YouTube or else and Blender Tutorial.

So, This is the result of my learning.

[ About Unity Asset Store That Uses in this Project ]

Palmov Island: Low Poly Environment Park

Treasure Sounds: Arcade Sounds

[ About Game ]

The purpose of the game is easy, you just kill any enemies and you can finish the game with you have to kill the final boss and the final released when you had killed the easy boss 3 times

Support: Computer Keyboard
Movement: ( W A S D )

Change Target Direction: (K) (L)

Press (J) to shoot a bullet

Lives Point [1] Game Over When down to zero.

Use Power Up When the [2] is full and press (O) to get power up.
